nodes.text: Augusta I'att was a Human female who co-founded I'att Armament with her husband, Strephan and was the grandmother to Tinian and great-grandmother to Tam Azur-Jamin respectively.

In her later years Augusta contracted a rare degenerative condition incurable on Druckenwell which, without expensive treatment, was slowly killing her and made traveling impractical. As this was contrary to Moff Kerioth's plans to move the weapon developers to Doldur and hijack their technology, he had Augusta and Strephan executed.
